name: From Hell (Lady_C)
description:
An epic tale about a half-god fighting their way from Hell to the Olympus, where they truly belong. 

——————————

If you are a sensitive reader, please take the time to read the Content Warnings before playing.

If you see any weird things, or typos, don't hesitate to drop a comment!

——————————

The game include a part of randomness, meaningful choices and the collect/use of objects.
Words count: ~12 000
Average gameplay time: ~20 minutes
The game has two endings, but multiple ways of reaching them.
